languages.text: "Согласно полученным нами данным, фрейлина Мейв прошла сервиторизацию. Прозорливо, Вольный Торговец, весьма".
"According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."
languages.original_text: "Согласно полученным нами данным, фрейлина Мейв прошла сервиторизацию. Прозорливо, Вольный Торговец, весьма".

traits.locale_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."
"According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."
"According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."
"According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."
"According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

languages.text: "Den uns vorliegenden Informationen zufolge hat sich die Kammerzofe Maive der Servitut Imperpituis unterzogen. Raffiniert, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wirklich raffiniert."
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: "Den uns vorliegenden Informationen zufolge hat sich die Kammerzofe Maive der Servitut Imperpituis unterzogen. Raffiniert, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wirklich raffiniert."

languages.text: « D'après les informations que nous avons reçues, la dame d'honneur Maive a été condamnée à la Servitude Imperpituis. Rusé, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, très rusé. »
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: « D'après les informations que nous avons reçues, la dame d'honneur Maive a été condamnée à la Servitude Imperpituis. Rusé, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, très rusé. »

languages.text: “根据我们得到的情报显示，那位叫做梅芙的侍女已经被改造成了机仆。好手段，行商浪人，真是好手段。”
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: “根据我们得到的情报显示，那位叫做梅芙的侍女已经被改造成了机仆。好手段，行商浪人，真是好手段。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo con la información que hemos recibido, la dama de honor ha sido sometida a Servidumbre Imperpituis. Astut{mf|o|a}, Comerciante, muy astut{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo con la información que hemos recibido, la dama de honor ha sido sometida a Servidumbre Imperpituis. Astut{mf|o|a}, Comerciante, muy astut{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: 「私たちが受け取った情報によれば、侍女のメイヴは不眠奉仕の刑を受けたとのことです。抜け目ないですね、ローグトレーダー。実に抜け目ない」
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちが受け取った情報によれば、侍女のメイヴは不眠奉仕の刑を受けたとのことです。抜け目ないですね、ローグトレーダー。実に抜け目ない」

languages.text: "Aldığımız bilgilere göre nedime Maive, Müebbet Hizmet cezasına çarptırılmış. Yemezler Hür Tacir... Yemezler."
languages.original_text: "According to the information we have received, the lady-in-waiting Maive has undergone Servitude Imperpituis. Shrewd, Rogue Trader, very shrewd."

traits.locale_text: "Aldığımız bilgilere göre nedime Maive, Müebbet Hizmet cezasına çarptırılmış. Yemezler Hür Tacir... Yemezler."
